76930.<%sL_STORAGE_NAME>が いっぱいなので\n調理が できません。<:

cook...<end>

76932.一度 コツをつかんだレシピは\n『いっぱつしあげ』が できるようになります。\n:
Once you have a knack for a recipe, the "Quick Craft" command becomes available.
Quick Craft allows you to finish the item in no time flat! However, items created this way can never be ★★★ quality.
In addition, the chance of getting a critical hit while using "Craft Normally" has increased slightly!

76933.<%sL_RECIPE>のレシピは\nまだ 覚えていません。<end>:
I still don't remember the recipe for
<%sL_RECIPE>...<end>

76934.調理設備がある。\n調理のレシピを 覚えれば\nここで 調理が できそうだ。:
It's a cooking facility.
If you know a cooking recipe, you can cook it
here.

76935.そのカテゴリのレシピは\nまだ 覚えていません。<end>:
You don't know any recipes of this category
yet.<end>

76937.<%sL_RECIPE>を 作るには\n<pc>の 調理職人レベルが\n<%nL:
To create a <%sL_RECIPE>, use the
<pc> The cook level of <%nL_HITUYOU_LV> or higher
is required...<end>

76938.調理とは フライパンにのせた 具材を焼いて\n目的のアイテムを 作ることです。\:
Cooking is when you cook the ingredients on the pan to create the desired item. As you cook the ingredients, the browning meter
rises. When the meter is full, the ingredients are ready to eat... All the ingredients are ready to eat. The quality of
the final product is determined by the accuracy of this... To execute a cooking command, you must concentrate. If you lose
concentration, you won't be able to execute them, so pace yourself and choose your commands... The closer the ingredients are to
the center of the pan, the higher the browning meter will be, so adjust the position of the ingredients... If the game is
interrupted during the cooking process due to a communication error, all ingredients will be lost.

76939.調理の遊び方の説明です！\n<br>\n毎ターン 具材を焼く度に\n各具材の 焼:
Here's how to play cooking! Each turn, as you cook an ingredient, the doneness meter for each ingredient goes up. When the doneness
meter is full... When the browning meter is full, the ingredients are ready to eat. When all the ingredients are ready to eat, use the
"finish" command. But be careful, because if the meter fills up again, the ingredients will be burnt and burned... The closer the
ingredients are to the center of the pan, the easier it is for the burn meter to rise. Let's aim for perfection while paying
attention to our concentration!

76940.<%sL_RECIPE>を作るには\n素材が 足りません。<end>:

<%sL_RECIPE>...<end>

76941.調理設備がある。\n調理職人であれば\nここで アイテムが作れそうだ。:

If you're a cook, you can craft items here.

76944.調理設備がある。\nフライパンがあれば\nここで 調理が できそうだ。:
It's a cooking facility.
If you have a frying pan, you can cook here.

78788.ダブルたて返しを使うと \n縦横２マスにある 上下の具材を\n入れ替えることがで:
With the double flap, you can swap the top
and bottom ingredients in the two squares...

78789.ダブルよこ返しを使うと \n縦横２マスにある 左右の具材を\n入れ替えることがで:
Using the double yoko-tsuki, you can swap the
ingredients on the left and right sides of
the two squares...

78791.ななめムーブを使うと\nななめのマスに 具材を移動することができます。:
You can use the move to move the ingredients
to a square in a diagonal line...

78792.弱火焼きを使うと\n全てのマスを ４ターンの間\n半分の火力で 焼くことができま:
When you use low fire, you can burn all the
squares at half power for four turns.

78793.強火焼きを使うと\n全てのマスを ４ターンの間\n強い火力で 焼くことができます:
When you use high fire, you can burn all the
squares for four turns with high heat.

78794.まぜあわせを使うと\n上下左右にある 同じ種類の具材と\n焼き加減を 揃えること:
With the Maze-a-Maze-boshi, you can match the
same type of ingredients on the top, bottom,
left and right sides of the pan...

78795.ねらい焼きを使うと\n選択したマスを 通常より高い会心率で\n焼くことができます:
With Aimed Burn, you can burn selected
squares at a higher rate of attack than
normal...

78796.完熱封じを使ったマスは しばらくの間\n何をしても 焼けなくなります。:
The trout that used the full heat seal won't
burn for a while, no matter what you do...

78797.たて返しを使うと \n縦２マスにある 上下の具材を\n入れ替えることができます。:
By using the vertical flipside, you can swap
the top and bottom ingredients in the two
vertical squares...

78798.トップターンを使うと\n上の列にある具材を 下の列まで\n一気に飛ばすことができ:
Using the top turn, the ingredients in the
top row can be flown all the way down to the
bottom row...

78799.よこ返しを使うと \n横２マスにある 左右の具材を\n入れ替えることができます。:
If you use the yoko-tsugi, you can switch the
ingredients in the two horizontal squares...
